question.title: SQL Error: 1054, SQLState: 42S22 Unknown column 'oc' in 'field list'
question.body:
I am trying to write a native query in Spring Boot JPA, but whenever I try to execute, I get the following exception:

[http-nio-8081-exec-4] o.h.e.j.s.SqlExceptionHelper: SQL Error: 1054, SQLState: 42S22

[http-nio-8081-exec-4] o.h.e.j.s.SqlExceptionHelper: Unknown column 'oc' in 'field list'

[http-nio-8081-exec-4] o.b.c.e.h.RestExceptionHandler: could not extract ResultSet; SQL [n/a]; nested exception is org.hibernate.exception.SQLGrammarException: could not extract ResultSet

.InvalidDataAccessResourceUsageException: could not extract ResultSet; SQL [n/a]; nested exception is org.hibernate.exception.SQLGrammarException: could not extract ResultSet

Following is the query i wrote inside the repository along with the method:

@Query(value = "SELECT \n" +
        " oc.id AS 'Id',\n" +
        " oc.created_at AS 'Created Date',\n" +
        " octd.reference_number AS 'Cheque Number',\n" +
        " octd.created_at AS 'Cheque Date',\n" +
        " SUM(ocd.amount) AS 'Total Amount',\n" +
        " oc.status AS 'Receipt Status',\n" +
        " oc.created_by AS 'Created By',\n" +
        " oc.receipt_id AS 'Receipt IDs',\n" +
        " u.user_id_pk AS ‘User ID',\n" +
        " u.user_name AS 'Full Name',\n" +
        " c.contact AS 'Contact',\n" +
        " c.email AS 'Email'\n" +
        "FROM table1 AS oc\n" +
        " INNER JOIN table2 AS ocd ON ocd.table1_id_fk = oc.id\n" +
        " INNER JOIN table3 AS octd ON octd.table1_id_fk = oc.id\n" +
        " INNER JOIN table4 AS u ON u.email = oc.created_by\n" +
        " INNER JOIN table5 AS c ON c.table5_id = oc.table5_fk\n" +
        "WHERE\n" +
        " (?1 IS NULL OR oc.created_by IN (?1))\n" +
        " ((?2 IS NULL OR ?3 IS NULL) OR octd.created_at BETWEEN ?2 AND ?3)\n" +
        " AND (?4 IS NULL OR oc.status = ?3)\n” +
        " AND (?5 IS NULL OR c.full_name LIKE CONCAT('%', ?4, '%'))\n" +
        " AND (?6 IS NULL OR c.contact LIKE CONCAT('%', ?5, '%'))\n" +
        "GROUP BY oc.id , oc.created_at , octd.reference_number , octd.created_at , oc.status , u.full_name , oc.receipt_id , u.user_id_pk , u.user_name , u.phone , u.email",
        nativeQuery = true)
Page<Object[]> getSummary(
        @Param("createdByEmails") List<String> createdByEmails,
        @Param("startDate") String startDate,
        @Param("endDate") String endDate,
        @Param("receiptStatus") Status receiptStatus,
        @Param(“name”) String name,
        @Param("contact") String contact,
        Pageable pageable);

I already tried some of the solutions available on Stack, like adding the following property in the app.config file:

spring.jpa.hibernate.naming.physical-strategy=org.hibernate.boot.model.naming.PhysicalNamingStrategyStandardImpl

Also, using a single quote instead of back-ticks or double-quotes.

This is the main part of the query. I have used table1, table2 as examples, as the code is private and has removed some parts of the query to make it shorter.
